Title: Kgateway transformation policy template can emit files from the container
Description: The transformation policy template feature in Kgateway versions through 2.0.4 allows users with TrafficPolicy creation permissions to craft transformations that read and expose arbitrary files from the dataplane container filesystem.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 2.0.5, all versions starting from 2.1.0-agw-cel-rbac before 2.1.0
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 2.0.5 before 2.1.0-agw-cel-rbac, all versions starting from 2.1.0
